title.bibl: Skandinaven, Sept. 19, 1917. Concert for the Children's Home.

div.bibl: Skandinaven, Sept. 19, 1917. CONCERT FOR THE CHILDREN'S HOME.

body.p: The Norwegian Singing Society, the Norwegian Sport's Club Music Corps, and the ladies singing society "Grieg," gave a concert for the benefit of the children's home at Edison Park last Sunday. More than one thousand people traveled out to the park to enjoy the concert.
A collection taken for the benefit of the home, and the proceeds from the sale of coffee amounted to about $200.
